dct_title_s: Plan de Madraz Et Du Fort St. Georges : Pris par les François le 21 Septembre 1746 = Grondtekening van Madras en't Fort St. Georges : door de Fransen ingenoomen den 21 September 1746
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:725 Date from pencil in lower left and previously assigned call number. Relief around fort and on shore shown with hachures. North oriented to the right. Original source unconfirmed though likely a Dutch edition of Histoire geáneárale des voyages, ... / edition Antoine F. Preávost D'Exiles.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
